name: `Awesome Nails Salon Dress Up - Girl Beauty Makeover Spa Free
name_original: `Awesome Nails Salon Dress Up - Girl Beauty Makeover Spa Free
description:
***Love getting your manicures and nails done? Then this app is just for you!***

Design your nails with dozens of unique customizations in this Nail Salon! Paint your nails with a beautiful sparkly gloss, add exotic patterns, and decorate with adorable cute designs! Tons of extra goodies are also included!

Remember to save your amazing designs and show off your to your friends!

Features include:
-Different designs for individual finger!
-Numerous different nail patterns to choose from
-Various backgrounds to choose (to match your nails!)
-Different skin tones to choose
-Saving gallery to store many designs
-Simple sharing feature to friends via Facebook or E-mail!
-Many more features!!!

Please report bugs or comments to rwuapps@gmail.com. Your information is greatly appreciated!

NOTE: A Nails Salon Dress Up - Girl Beauty Spa Free is a free to play app. Game offers in-app purchases with real money.
